Articles.Content:
I\'ve recently run into a problem involving my monitor and i know allot of the KSP community know allot about computers.

so when i start up my computer (its a windows computer it gets past the windows logo but then the screen goes black and it says out of range!. I\'ve started it in safe mode and tried adjusting the screen resolution but nothing so far has worked hoping someone can help (im writing this through safe mode) Thank you.

I\'ve recently run into a problem involving my monitor and i know allot of the KSP community know allot about computers.

so when i start up my computer (its a windows computer it gets past the windows logo but then the screen goes black and it says out of range!. I\'ve started it in safe mode and tried adjusting the screen resolution but nothing so far has worked hoping someone can help (im writing this through safe mode) Thank you.

What do you mean by out-of-range? Is this a new monitor? Have you attempted to fix the settings on the monitor via the monitor?
no its not a new monitor and yes ive been trying to fix the problems via this monitor
it just says out of range on the screen like it would if you started a new game in say 2000x900 when your screen is 1000x600
Reinstall the monitor drivers. It is a problem with the drivers.
thanks but how do i do that ?

thanks but how do i do that ?

I am not going to tell you how to reinstall drivers. Just type in how to reinstall drivers in google.
